page.title: 11HOME FARM
page.content: This farm is managed by Mr. A. Jones for The Earl of Halifax. They keep only sheep and cattle. The houses are in a courtyard as it used to be a stable and coach house. All the buildings in the courtyard are used as sheds. All of the farm is surrounded by grass. It has a sheep dip in a pen. There is big Dutch Barn where they keep the straw and hay. Two people work on the farm which has three tractors and a few implements. There are two sheep dogs to work with the sheep there is a flock of Jacob sheep. The sheep graze the parkland surrounding Garrowby Hall. The cattle and sheep are sold at York Market.
